All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminControl
Contains the admin user interface to allow them to modify Movie Database and Cineplex Database
AdminOptions
Allows the admin to change the configurations for the app
Booking
Allows the user to book their movie of choice based on the movieListing
Cinema
Represents a single cinema location
CinemaPrinter
Prints out a cinema's information
ConsoleColors
All the colors used for the seat colors In order for it to work: Download ANSI console through the eclipse marketplace under help
ControlPanel
The start point of MOBLIMA App.
CustomerApp
Contains the functions that interact with the customer
Hall
Represents a single cinema hall in a cineplex
Login
Login system to authenticate users.
MLDataObject
Temporary object to convert into MovieListing
MLDOControl
Utility functions for the MovieListingDataObject (MLDO)
Movie
Represents a movie with all the relevant information
MovieControl
Contains the functions to modify the Movie database (csv file)
MovieListing
Represents a single movie listing
MovieListing.dayOfWeek
Day of the week or whether it's a public holiday
MovieListing.screenType
Type of screen: Whether it's 2d or 3d
MovieListingControl
Used for letting the user choose the movie listing
Options
Represents the current configurations for the app that the admin can change
ReadCSVFiles
Utility class containing all the functions to read and extract information from CSV files into a List object.
Register
Used to create a new member/guest
Review
Represents a single review by a customer
Seat
Represents a seat in a cinema hall
SortTop
Utility class to display a list of the top 5 movies.
TextToHall
Utility class to convert text in CSV file to a Hall object
TextToReview
Utility class to convert text in CSV file to a Review object
Ticket
Represents a ticket to be issued to the customer
Ticket.ticketType
Type of ticket (Adult, Senior or Child)
User
Represents a user's details in the system
WriteCSVFiles
Utility class which contains all the functions to write a List of objects back into the csv file.
